definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wait (?; cf. As. damâmu, groan, wail, lament, Dl:Baer's Ezech xi; pr 64)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[דּׂ֫מּוּ ישְׁבֵי אִי]] Is 23:2 wail, ye coast dwellers (cf. Dl:l. c.), ‖[[הֵילִילוּ]] v:Is 23:1, & [[הֵילִילוּ ישְׁבֵי אִי]] v:Is 23:6; most, however, assign this to I. [[דמם]] q. v. (
